item.text: Documentation of medical necessity
Does the documentation support the client’s need for ongoing self-monitoring?
Does the documentation explain why an automated blood pressure device will not meet the client’s needs?
Components, Replacements, and Repairs
Is prior authorization required for replacement of blood pressure cuffs?
Is prior authorization required for repair of equipment?
Bone Growth Stimulators
Is the client skeletally mature?
Does the client meet the criteria for coverage through Title XIX Home Health Services?
Is the client eligible for THSteps-CCP if under 21 years of age?
Is the client eligible for DME Exceptional Circumstances if over 21 years of age?
Prior Authorization Criteria and Documentation Requirements for Bone Growth Stimulators
Is prior authorization required for procedure codes E0747, E0748, E0749, and E0760?
Is a completed DME/Medical Supplies Prescribing Provider Order Form required?
Does the documentation include procedure codes and quantities for services requested?
Documentation for Noninvasive Electrical Bone Growth Stimulator
Is there documentation of nonunions, failed fusions, or congenital pseudarthrosis?
Have serial radiographs confirmed no progressive signs of healing?
Is the fractured gap 1 cm or less?
Claims Reimbursement for Professional Services
Does the claim include documentation of medical necessity?
Was the corresponding bone growth stimulator device submitted within 95 days?
Breast Feeding Support Services
Refer to Section 3 for information about breastfeeding support services.
